data.text: @DenverChannel Yet this is the time to remove the restrictions?

@DenverChannel Yet those  "fully vaxxed" still get the virus? how is that possible. BUT if you had the Covid early on and have not gotten it again, you're considered a person of interest to the covid police. Natual immunity is a real thing, yet it is dismissed since no money can be made off it.
@DenverChannel I remember when we would be freaking out about a 4% positivity rate.
@DenverChannel So when do hospitals stop with the forced vaccine for employment or clinical for students
